titles.title: He's Building A Body In The Earth Today

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's building a body in the earth today.
He's building a body and it's not of clay.
A spiritual body for the glory of God,
He's building a body in the earth today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Find your place in the body in the earth today.
Get in to God's order and learn to obey.
The death to self message will show you the way.
To get into the body in the earth today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We're singing a new song in the earth today.
We're singing a new song and it's not for pay.
It's Christ in His body. It's Jesus the Head.
It's on to perfection. It's raising the dead.
